When: You should _already_ know! It's on October 19th-21st!
HackUPC starts on October 19th at 3PM and ends at 5PM on the 21st :timer_clock:
Where: HackUPC is celebrated in UPC Campus Nord :world_map: See https://goo.gl/maps/usj7JrdQgfx
HackUPC takes place at FIB, UPC Campus Nord, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, Europe, World, Solar System, Milky Way, Universe. :smirk:
Sunny Barcelona is the location of HackUPC :sunny:
Schedule: 22:30 - 23:00 -> [Talk] InfoJobs: Kotlin, a modern language for modern times
23:00 - 23:30 -> [Talk] iThinkUPC: Getting started with iThinkUPC Challenge
23:00 - 23:30 -> [Talk] Itequia: Let's make some music with Javascript
23:30 - 23:59 -> [Talk] Opentrends: Chat bot with Google Assistant
00:00 - 00:30 -> [Talk] AWSEducate: Getting started with Serverless Architectures
11:00 - 11:30 -> [Talk] Vueling: Getting fast responses from massive databases
11:30 - 12:00 -> [Talk] ServiZurich: In memory processing pipelines running in the cloud
12:00 - 13:00 -> [Talk] Sopra Steria: Getting started with Natural Language Processing
